issue.title: [C++] ExecBatch conversion to RecordBatch may go out of bounds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18004](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18004). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When the schema given to `ExecBatch::ToRecordBatch` is wider than the `ExecBatch` values vector, an out-of-bounds index is accessed.
